issue.title: etoland.co.kr

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

labels.name: List-KR
labels.description: Problematic issues, handled in List-KR

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

comment.body:
@piquark6046 전부 시도해보았지만 변화가 없었습니다.
근데 Naver에 다시 로그인을 시도하던 중 어제와 다른 점을 찾았습니다. 어제까진 User-Agent 변경 후 2단계 인증 시 표기된 기기가 Linux로 나타났었는데, 지금은 본래 환경인 Windows 10 Chrome로 나타납니다.
혹시 User Agent가 변경되지 않은 것인지 확인하기 위해 다른 사이트에서 확인했으나, 정상적으로 변경된 상태인 것을 확인했습니다.
User-Agent 숨기기가 Naver에서만 적용되지 않는 걸까요?

comment.body:
> ### Issue URL (Ads)
> [https://e.mail.ru/1/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.mail.ru%2F1%2F)
> 
> ### Comment
> > Перестала блокироваться верхняя строка рекламы в почте mail.ru.
> > Username: `@Иван Белов`
> 
> ### Screenshots
> Screenshot 1
> Screenshot 2
> ### System configuration
> Information	Value
> AdGuard product:	AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.53
> System version:	Windows 10
> Browser:	Chrome
> Stealth mode:	disabled
> Filters:	Ad Blocking:
> AdGuard Base
> 
> Language-specific:
> AdGuard Russian
> Other extensions used:	Adblock Plus, uBlock Origin 1.58.0

Проблема решена.
1. Мешал (конфликт) Adblock Plus -отключил. Оставил uBlock Origin, AdGuard , и RU AdList JS Fixes. 
2. Добавил строки в AdGuard : [https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pcyJ7OaJuk3CLbDhHEI1hMl8a5bT__e9/view?usp=sharing](url)
3. Теперь все выглядит хорошо : 
![Снимок экрана (4)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/129874749/94929edd-a03f-4529-9ca6-936fbc6cd43c)

comment.body:
Для тех, у кого не установлена экстра, рекомендуется это сделать.

---

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
I don't see popups there.

---


Try to clear browser data, leave only AdGuard filters (the list of the filters below), update them (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
```
AdGuard Base
AdGuard Tracking Protection
AdGuard Social Media
AdGuard Annoyances
```

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Safari

### AdGuard version

Version 1.11.18 (build 332, CT 2.0.44)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

kms-full.com
kmspico.ws
kmspico.io

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, I don't care about cookies, EasyList Cookie List, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

This website deceives users into downloading malware by making them believe they are installing a legitimate Windows activator.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://www.ddd-smart.net/doujinshi3/show-m.php?g=20240618&dir=007&page=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ddd-smart.net%2Fdoujinshi3%2Fshow-m.php%3Fg%3D20240618%26dir%3D007%26page%3D0) ### Comment > div.yybrwxOverlay > > This issue is caused by Adguard on iPhone's inability to handle iframes properly. There is no specific rule in place to hide the ad placeholder. On PC, blocking the script reduces the size to 0, effectively hiding the ad frame. However, on iPhone, the iframe remains visible, which is why it's expected that the ad frame does not disappear. If there are any other reasons contributing to this behavior, please let me know for future reference. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ipa0p1zluxkcc4s0g4wg88k8gwgcwo8ag38dpj9bog.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r1dramyyxb4g0swwo8ko08ck04g8ogw6vzpu0xtm1g.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.4 System version: | 17.5 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://doh.opendns.com/dns-query`

issue.title: www.ddd-smart.net

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://www.ddd-smart.net/doujinshi3/show-m.php?g=20240618&dir=007&page=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ddd-smart.net%2Fdoujinshi3%2Fshow-m.php%3Fg%3D20240618%26dir%3D007%26page%3D0) ### Comment > div.yybrwxOverlay > > This issue is caused by Adguard on iPhone's inability to handle iframes properly. There is no specific rule in place to hide the ad placeholder. On PC, blocking the script reduces the size to 0, effectively hiding the ad frame. However, on iPhone, the iframe remains visible, which is why it's expected that the ad frame does not disappear. If there are any other reasons contributing to this behavior, please let me know for future reference. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ipa0p1zluxkcc4s0g4wg88k8gwgcwo8ag38dpj9bog.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r1dramyyxb4g0swwo8ko08ck04g8ogw6vzpu0xtm1g.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.4 System version: | 17.5 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://doh.opendns.com/dns-query`

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://mine-3m.com/articles/14811](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmine-3m.com%2Farticles%2F14811) ### Comment > On a computer using Chrome, it may seem like there's nothing left, but in reality, the frame remains because the image is not properly hidden. This doesn't happen on an iPhone. The frame of the image remains, so the border appears as shown in the screenshot. > If you check using developer tools, you'll see that elements with the same class name remain on both the computer and the iPhone. > > Additionally, the PR section below is also hidden as self-promotion. ### Screenshots
